tool.name: Filter Hits
tool.description: Remove hits from a blast (or other) hit table.

param.name: m8format
param.label: Hit table format
param.option: Gene: Blast-like plus read and hit description columns
Liz: Blast-like plus hit description column

param.name: numHits
param.label: Keep this many hits per read

param.name: bitScore
param.label: Keep only hits with this score or greater

param.name: filterPct
param.label: Keep only hits within this percentage of the best hit for each read. 0-> only the top score for each read.

param.name: evalue
param.label: Keep only hits with this evalue or less

param.name: pctID
param.label: Keep only hits with this percent identity or greater

param.name: nonoverlapping
param.label: Remove hits that overlap higher-scoring hits on the same query sequence.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Text Manipulation->Convert* or *Blast->Parse blast text*
-----
**What it does**
This tool takes a (b)last hit table and reomves hits that don't meet the specified criteria.
